titleStmt.title: Count Mansfields directions of vvarre Giuen to all his officers and souldiers in generall.
titleStmt.author: Mansfeld, Ernst, graf von, 1585-1626.
W. G., fl. 1624.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Edw: Allde for Richard Whittaker, and are to be sold at his shop in Pauls Church-yard, at the Kings head,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
